original_title: Seth Rogen Is the Worst Person in the World
overview: In this short from Funny Or Die, Seth Rogen realizes that after raising millions of dollars for charity, he's done with good deeds -- and can finally do all the terrible things he's always wanted to do. Like rob banks. And cook meth with Walter White. And vote Romney.
tagline: Seth Rogen Becomes Worst Person In The World, 'Cause He Can
title: Seth Rogen Is the Worst Person in the World
